note.p: Children’s nurse. Daughter of Edward Westwood, cheesemonger and later cab proprietor, and Jane Westwood, of Finsbury, Middlesex. Bernard Darwin’s nurse. Married Arthur Parslow in April 1881.
BMD (Birth index, Marriage index, Death index)
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/855/85/6 s.v. Mary A. Westbrook)
letter from Emma Darwin to H. E. Litchfield, [11] April 1881 (DAR 219.9: 261)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1906 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 September 2016)
